block.p: A selective listing of state, county and local government events across Connecticut this week. (All dates and times subject to confirmation.) Items should be submitted by mail at least three weeks in advance to the Connecticut Op-Ed Page, The New York Times, 229 West 43rd Street, New York, N.Y. 10036, or by e-mail to ctcivic@nytimes.com.
STATE OF CONNECTICUT
Groton Public hearing on a certificate of environmental compatibility. Wednesday at 3 p.m. and 7 p.m. Groton Town Hall Annex, 134 Groton Long Point Road. (860) 441-6640.
Hartford Prehearing conference on a building permit. Tuesday at 1 p.m. Connecticut Department of Environmental Protection Headquarters, 79 Elm Street. (860) 424-3037.

Danbury Conservation Commission. Monday at 7:30 p.m. Danbury City Hall, 155 Deer Hill Avenue. (203) 797-4500.

Darien Charter Revision Commission. Thursday at 7:30 p.m. Darien Town Hall, 2 Renshaw Road. (203) 656-7300.

Redding Zoning Board of Appeals. Tuesday at 8 p.m. Redding Town Hall, 100 Hill Road. (203) 938-2002.
Ridgefield Insurance and Risk Management Committee. Tuesday at 7 p.m. Ridgefield Town Hall, 400 Main Street. (203) 431-2700.
Shelton Planning and Zoning Commission special meeting. Thursday at 7 p.m. Shelton Economic Development Corporation, 64 Bridge Street. (203) 924-1555.
